name: Nuton Text Share WordPress
author: jewel1994

sections.description:
Nuton Text Share WordPress is a super WordPress plugin which allows share a visitor selected/highlighted text to Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin,Reddit and Email. Nuton Text Share WordPress is a super WordPress plugin which allows share an user selected/highlighted text to top social site. To start, simple select the text you want to share. Currently works in the latest versions of IE, Opera, Firefox and Chrome.

Version

1.0.0
Released version

compatible with wordpress 4.7.3
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Nuton Text Share WordPress plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  1. Unzip the nuton-text-share-wordpress.zip file locally to your machine
  2. Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  3. Upload the Palto Carousel folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  4. Go to plugin and activate Nuton Text Share WordPress.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  1. Login to your WordPress admin area.
  2. Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top
  3. Click the Upload plugin button at the top
  4. Click the Choose File button and locate the nuton-text-share-wordpress.zip
  5. File on your machine and click the Install Now button
  6. On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
Can I share my website content by Nuton Text Share WordPress

Yes, you can share selected/highlighted text.
